review_text: Amy’s home is beautiful and so peaceful! The space was cozy, comfortable and the perfect place to relax. She, her family and their pups are incredibly warm and welcoming and I felt right at home from the moment I arrived to when I was leaving. Very grateful for the accommodations. Would highly recommend this spot for anyone looking for a peaceful retreat!

Absolutely great experience. My Grandson loved the “bunkhouse”. Great time fishing in the pond. Only issue was that google maps did not guide me to destination and had me on Tom White road at an electrical substation. Amy got us straightened out. Great experience!
great little secluded place! the dog greeters was probably the best part, they were beyond friendly! very clean!
The place was perfect for brief stay and Amy and her husband are great! The kids enjoyed fishing in the pond and playing with the dogs. We would definitely stay with them again.

Would greatly recommend staying at Amy's place! Very welcoming host in a peaceful setting! My kiddos loved fishing in the pond during our stay and playing with Pepper, the dog. Great location to feel "in the middle of nowhere" to unplug and relax but still convenient for shopping. Surrounding towns have great things to do with the whole family! Wifi/cell service is spotty, but was a plus to us!
Nice quite country setting on a lovely horse farm. Comfortable beds and great atmosphere.
As always we totally enjoyed our stay. Quiet and comfortable with beautiful surroundings. Love the puppers too :)

This rental is prefect for everything it claims to be and more. The dogs on property are very sweet as well and love to be pet.
I will gladly be coming back
We LOVED our stay. The quiet atmosphere was wonderful. I was able to work from there with no problem and the space was nice to come back to after a busy weekend. Thank you!!!
Great Place to stay. Nice and quiet. Thanks for having us!
All good a great experience and an excellent host
I’ve stayed at many air bnbs but Hannah has been the most pleasant to work with. Will definitely stay with them again.
Great spot quiet clean and comfortable
Hannah was so helpful since we were doing Thanksgiving there for our family. She went above and beyond.
Very pretty area and beautiful home!
Hannah was a great hostess and the house was just what our family needed for our short stay. Thank you for making us feel right at home. Excellent communication.
It was a wonderful place to stay while we visited our son at Murray State! Not too far from campus and a short drive into Paris!
Great for boat parking and close to groceries and gas
Just wonderful.Excellent location and so clean and bright!Cant wait to stay again!!!Why stay in a hotel when you can stay in the peaceful country!

We would definitely visit this beautiful cottage again! The views were spectacular! We ate breakfast on the lovely patio & saw a couple deer. It was so peaceful. We left feeling rested. We had everything we needed for our stay!
great place and host. would come back again!

Hannah's unit is everything you would expect from a countryside guest house.
It was spacious and did not disappoint. It was quiet, peaceful, and private.
Our favorite thing to do was have morning coffee on the back deck while watching deer in the field and listening to the birds.
Recommended!
Great Host and very accommodating
It was great to be there!!! It was peaceful and great location. Very clean and nice!!
Hannah provided a great place to stay for my family and I. She made the whole process easy and the house was above and beyond what we expected.
The only things was 2 of my tv was not working and 1 of my fireplace was not working. I send a text and no responds.

The host is very accommodating with great communication. The house was very spacious. The kitchen was well equipped. There was plenty of parking. Just a friendly note that there is a strict policy of no febreeze products. Highly recommend and would stay again!
Great place to stay.
Hannah was great! Truly accommodating for all of my installation team! She was helpful in every area!
We enjoyed our stay!

This was my first AirBnB experience and Hannah and her cottage definitely set the bar high! We spent over a week at the cottage and it felt like home. Hannah made sure we were settled in and had what we needed. Communication with her is top notch and she is always quick to respond. I can't wait to stay there again next fall. My family has begun a new tradition of staying here.

Hannah's house is inviting and comfortable. In a natural setting so you can see wildlife yet you are only like 10 minutes from town. When we walked in there was a refreshing scent and natural light in the house. The house has decorated notes from Hannah on their requests, so much better than a note stuck to something. The beds were comfortable, and plenty of linens were provided. We had one small issue, where a blind broke while we were using it and Hannah made sure it was fixed very quickly. Hannah's house made for a quiet and peaceful stay. Hannah's house will be our number one pick when we visit Paris!

We recently stayed at Hannah's beautiful property while in the area for a multi day fishing tournament. This is an outstanding property that is extremely clean and well supplied. The country setting is quiet and relaxing, but very convenient to town and the lakes. We had no issues with our stay, but Hannah made it clear that she was available should any arise. We highly recommend this property and would stay again if the opportunity arose. Dennis, Ronnie and Becky.

Hannah was an awesome host. She made sure we had everything we needed. She even went out of her way to help us with a boat parking dilemma. We couldn't have asked for a better place to stay for our fishing tournament. We will definitely stay here again.
Hannah is a wonderful host! This place is a great find for anyone traveling to Paris Tn. Country setting but close to a everything in Paris.
This was a beautiful place to stay and very inviting. Had an amazing stay. The host was very kind and easy to communicate with. Will definitely stay there again. AMAZING!!!!!!!!!
Such a cute cottage to stay at! Hostess was very nice and communication was terrific!

Everything as advertised and more. Super smooth check in and very good instructions/information. Over and above well stocked house. Everything you could need and more. Cozy, super clean and the view from the back and drive in is so beautiful. Hosts are so accommodating and communicative. Could not have asked for anything else.
Wish there were 6 stars because thats what this place deserves!!! Best house I have ever stayed in!!! Accommodations were second to none!!! Thanks Hannah!!!
We visited my husbands niece in Paris and we stayed here at Hannah’s house . It was wonderful! Victorian modern farmhouse feel . Beautiful, clean , Great showers and beds. Very relaxing .

This house is amazing!!! Hannah is a wonderful host! Everything we needed was right at our fingertips! We came for a fishing tournament and the house had enough parking for two oversized vehicles plus our boats! The house had plenty of room for us to spread out and rest!! It was perfect and we will be back!!! Thank you, Hannah!

Hanna’s home is beautiful and inviting, the whole home and property is very inviting. We are able to have family dinners with plenty of space, furniture very comfortable and spacious bathrooms very clean and spacious. I appreciated the communication between Hanna and I through the stay she is very accommodating and punctual. I would recommend this home to everyone traveling through Paris to stay with Hannah
Great place to stay in Paris. Much better than any local hotel. The house is very clean, quaint, and spacious. Great value
Very nice stay. As advertised!
This place was nice. It was clean and spacious. Not very far from Paris, TN. The Queen bed was comfortable.

HIGHLY RECOMMEND!! Hannah was the perfect host, very responsive and accommodating. This home is set in a beautiful county setting and very close to grocery stores, gas stations, etc. The home is as pictured and described or better and very clean. I did a lot of food preparation during my stay and the house had all things one would need in the kitchen. There is plenty of space in the living room and dining room to enjoy meals and family time. Look no further than this listing for your stay in Paris. It is wonderful!!!!

If you are looking for quiet relaxing peaceful stay....then this should be you next rental. This house is adorable, and covered all the bases of anything you would need. Tastefully decorated and very comfortable. Scenery is very pretty too. The town of Paris has plenty of good places to eat. Moustos, Aces, Toms and Take Me Back Cafe did not disappoint us. Hannah took great care in making sure there were many personal touches through out her home. Shows that she is very proud of her property. I only wish i could have stayed alittle longer.

Beautiful place! It was amazing to wake to the deer in the field in the morning and fireflies at night. The view of creation provided was outstanding. We enjoyed our stay. Hannah was excellent at responding. We also enjoyed the breakfast buffet at Ann and Dave’s cafe. We would definitely stay here again if given the opportunity.

Absolutely the best host. We loved our weekend stay at the cottage. Hostess is very easy to communicate with and had provided all kinds of extra supplies that is not normally provided. Loved that it was handicapped accessible and has adequate provisions for handicapped. If you are looking for a place to stay this is it. It’s quiet and has some beautiful scenery. There was an abundance of wildlife to watch as well, which my husband and father in law loved.
Hannah was a superb host. The home exceeded our expectations. The beds were super comfortable. Can’t wait to return. Thank you, Hannah.

This little cottage is packed with every necessity you could need for an out of town trip. From the electric teapot to the fireplace in the bedroom, Hannah has thought of everything to make your stay wonderful. The cottage is clean, has fluffy white towels, and thoughtful touches throughout. It is easy to find in a very quiet country setting. We watched a herd of deer as we drank our morning coffee. If you need a quiet, exceptionally clean place to stay while you visit west Tennessee, this is the place.
This home is very spacious and clean. It is equipped with everything you need. The Hostess was wonderful to communicate with and on site. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay again.
Well appointed cabin. Neat, clean and roomy. Made our stay the best we have ever had when visiting Paris.
I booked this very last minute and she responded super fast and it was exactly as described. The bed was super comfy and everything was spotless!

Clean, welcoming and very comfortable. Had everything we needed. Lots of thoughtful things, extra pillows, chocolates, paper towels, ice, full kitchen needs, really felt like we had everything. More than expected.
Blueberry muffins to welcome us, YUM!!
Absolutely fantastic stay! there was not an amenity you could think of that was not provided. and house was spotless and very well laid out. will definitely stay here again!

Rhonda’s place was a sweet, homely, welcoming place. I was very comfortable in the home and felt very safe. The home was very clean and inviting. Rhonda goes the extra mile with her home. I would highly recommend staying at her place. Wonderful!!

We absolutely loved the little house and the host was so nice and helpful! We could not have asked for a better host. Rhonda checked with us to make sure we made it safely and to make sure if we needed anything to let her or her husband know. The house was so clean and very well maintained. We are so looking forward to coming back again soon!
This property is cute and unique. Unfortunately, we had to cut our visit short. Rhonda was very understanding and cooperative.
This Air BnB is an absolutely great place to stay. The bed was very comfortable. I would recommend to anyone looking for a good Air BnB to stay at.
We were in Paris for a wedding and needed a place to sleep and relax. This fit the bill.
It was great! Very clean. We love it!
The Blue cottage was adorable. The perfect place to lay my head after a great visit for labor day weekend.
The Host was amazing to work with and the home looked brand new inside. Everything was perfect!
Rhonda's place was just what we were looking for. We were there for five weeks, and Rhonda kept in touch to check on us and see if we needed anything. Highly recommend
we loved staying at the little blue cottage for a weekend! we would love to stay here again the next time we are in the area!
Very cozy place. The host was very gracious with allowing us to extend our stay several times.
Wonderful stay, wonderful host
It is always clean and cozy when I arrive! Rhonda is a great host and very accommodating. Highly recommend staying here.
Great place to stay in Paris. My 2nd time staying, and will stay again for sure
Great place to stay, everything was perfect and clean. My first Air bnb stay, will definitely be booking again. Rhonda always available and accommodating

The little blue cottage is so cute and comfy. My husband, toddler and myself had a lovely stay over the weekend. Host was so nice and sweet providing extra attention to her guest as far as things we could possibly need to make our stay warm and welcoming. Definitely 10/10 recommend anyone to stay here. Hoping we return one day.
It was perfect
Great place to stay. Well equipped and the host provided several unsuspected snacks. Very comfortable bed, with lots of space for two!

Wonderful stay with an abundance of supplies and snacks! I just needed a place to stay for travel work that I do, and this place was perfect for me. Would stay again! Random tid bit, the sheets have a fresh, clean smell which made me so happy. I've stayed at places where the sheets smelled over bearing with fragrance.

Nice, neat, clean, perfect lodging for a visit to Paris. Rhonda was the perfect host.
Lisa
quiet area, felt safe. Plenty of room, inside and out. Near Tennessee River...we went to a nearby landing for an afternoon walk. A very enjoyable trip!

There were no pics of the outside on the listing, so I was a bit puzzled when I pulled up. The place was nice and clean though. I had txted Ginger ahead of time, asking about the bedding arrangement, but didn’t get a reply. There was a queen bed, and thankfully a pull out cot, that I slept on. It was comfortable. Nice TV on the wall with a lot of channels, so was great, for the limited time we were there. Would definitely stay again
Everything is modern and new. We really enjoyed our stay!! Hot water on demand!! Very rustic and well planned. Thank You!!

I needed a night stay for a wedding about 10 minutes away and this tiny home was PERFECT for the night! Very cute, close by, safe, and thoughtfully set up. Also a great spot if I were to go back for a lake weekend or something when I have more available time!
Great place to lay your head down at night. Quiet country setting. Will definitely use again
Gingers AirBnB was exactly what we needed for our weekend trip to Sandy Creek Farms! Ginger messaged us back ASAP whenever we needed her and was happy to accommodate our stay!
This was a great place to stay! It was updated and looks just like the pictures, and the location was very quiet and peaceful. We would definitely recommend it!
Ginger was very kind and helpful with any questions we had! The self check-in was very appreciated since we arrived a little later in the night than we'd originally planned
Nice and private
Ginger was great, she always got back to me right away and fixed any issues I had quickly. The place was quality and clean.
Great place to stay
Really nice place, to many curvy roads to get to. Only thing is the tv did work, wouldnof like to have watched tv when I was laying down. Was a great place though, thank you very much

The home was exactly as described and very comfortable. We were traveling for a funeral and didn’t check in until later in the evening, due to the time of year it is (12/1/23) the fog was a little thick but that’s exactly what you can expect when driving. So if you are planning on getting there after dark make sure to be aware that it is close to a lake and there is fog. There are no complaints to be had with Ginger or her cute home. We are beyond happy with our stay and if we ever travel back to the area we will definitely book with her again.
It was a nice place to stay and really clean
place was as expected and all the listed facilities. Very peaceful neighborhood. Geri was very helpful during the stay.
Exceeded my expectations so much so that my family and I are now joining in Paris to re connect !!!

As super hosts ourselves, we were not expecting food crumbs and dried food on the kitchen table. ￼ The bed seemed quite soft and not the most comfortable. All in all we had what we needed. Download speeds were excellent, and the heat and hot water were both plentiful. ￼
This is an old house, some of which has not been updated. ￼
Geri always got back with us, though not always promptly, and often outside of Airbnb.

Everything was as expected and clean. Though we only stayed one night, we could tell the cabin was well stocked with cooking stuff, extra towels/linens, dvds, etc ..it’s a nice place to enjoy Paris. Geri communicated well, kind, and was helpful.
Will definitely use again in future. convenient, clean & cozy

This home is not a 5 star hotel. It is the perfect little place to stay for a few nights or a few weeks. It was convenient to be able to cook for ourselves when we wanted and plenty of locations when we didn't. Geri stopped by to check on us. She is a very nice host. We would do it again! Thanks Geri
Close to town peace and quiet evening

A cute and comfy place in a great location close to everything!! You get alot of space for the money. Geri is the most attentive host we've ever had, she was very helpful and friendly! We would definitely stay here again!!

This is not a fancy house, but a comfortable place in a friendly neighborhood. Well worth the price - a great deal. The host was in Florida when we were arriving, but we spoke by phone and text as needed, and she answered all our questions.
Nice large back yard. Paris is a small town, but we were close to everything we needed and learned our way around quickly.
I'd recommend Southside Cafe for breakfast or lunch, and don't miss Rocky Ridge Pit for some great barbecue.
beautiful place, flexible and communicative host

I have stayed at Geri’s placed several times. It is not fancy but it is very homey. The place is always clean and ready for my visit. I feel safe in the neighborhood. Geri is great to work with and easy to communicate with. I will definitely stay there again.
loved my stay can't wait for next time
This is in town, but it was a peaceful, quiet neighborhood. I'm always worried there'll be unwanted noise, but it just wasn't an issue. Great area, lots to explore and do. Would stay again.
Super friendly host, comfy bed, nice place overall!

Nice place.
Would definitely stay again.
A classic house with tons of charm. Very close to Courthouse Square on a quiet street.
Good location, adequately equipped kitchen/dining area and plenty of space to relax!
This is my second stay at Geri’s place. The home so very comfortable, clean, and Geri is a terrific and caring host. The home is in a great and safe feeling neighborhood. Great place to stay!
The place was clean and very lovely! I had a wonderful time and Geri is excellent with communication

Geri was a great host! Communication is excellent. The setting is just what I needed. It was quiet and 3 minutes from the Henry County genealogy library and archives. This was a research trip so how perfect was that?! We especially enjoyed the wildlife in the neighborhood! Two deer crossed the street near us...so special. God bless Geri!
Great place to stay and easy to get anywhere from there and far enough back in the suburbs and it’s a cozy place to stay
Very clean, comfortable, and conveniently located near everything! Geri was a wonderful host and made my stay that much better. Would definitely recommend.
If you're looking for a place in Paris Tennessee for a short stay this will be the location very very nice

This place is great! It is close to eating and shopping. The neighborhood Is cute and quiet. The home is older but very home like and very comfortable. It was very clean. The other two apartments were also rented and you could hear when they entered their apartment but then it was quiet. I would definitely recommend staying here.
Comfortable clean more than we expected.
We enjoyed our time and are grateful for this lovely place to stay in the future when we are in Paris 💛
This homely place had everything I needed for my 4-day business trip. Geri is very friendly and communicates well. I would definitely stay again.
Always a wonderful experience!
It's great place to stay. Its comfy and clean. It had everything I needed.
Geri is a great host! This was exactly what we needed for my father in law.
good place for.the price, would stay again
Cute little space! Lovely views from outside very cozy
Wonderful host. Relaxing place. Very clean and quaint~
Very nice older house in a good location . Quite neighborhood. Easy access to highway. Host was wonderful.
Nice little space! she made sure to connect with me before getting to the house!
Great place!
Had such a great time! Great place for a get away or just for one night! Super clean and neat! Great location!
Great stay!

Geri is very friendly and willing to go above and beyond for her guests. She responded to my inquiries and messages quickly. The house/apartment was cute and was in an area of good walkability. The only negative was the bed, which was very loud and uncomfortable; every time I or my friend shifted, we would wake the other up because of how squeaky it was. Overall, it was a very good stay at a great value.
Very great place to just take a load OffMAGNIFICENT HOST!! WILL BE BACK!
Clean and small apartment with good wifi and close to town. Older decor that made me feel like I was stepping back 30 years, visiting family. Price point is great for a weekend trip to Paris!

The price is fair for the accommodations. I used this location for nothing more than sleeping, showering and eating at the desk and that worked for me. There were stains on the couch, mattress and wallpaper peeling. Not what I am used too.
My contact Geri was pleasant and accommodating for a late check in. The nightly rates were low, the water was hot, the AC worked fantastically and the small town location had plenty of restaurants without traffic. The site is only 30 minutes from KY and only an hour and a half +/- from Nashville.
Great Place to stay! Quiet place and close to everything you could possibly need!

Clean, quiet, cheap. exactly what I was looking for. Geri was super communicative and went above and beyond as a host.
My one complaint is that the upstairs is also rented out, and I believe the bathroom is located directly above the bed. That and lack of insulation means you'll be woken up by the sound of your upstairs neighbor urinating and flushing. Unfortunate, but hey, you get what you pay for.
Wonderful experience! We would gladly stay here again. Very clean and cozy! Excellent host!
Very cute, clean place, good location. Nice neighborhood. The host was very friendly and accommodating
The place was just what my son and I needed. Very clean and peaceful...Geri made the check in easy... Looking forward to staying there again...
Awesome host and one great stay++!! Thank you!
Super cute and cozy. Perfect location and ease of rental. Thanks so much Geri for the last minute accommodations.
Had a lovely time. Quiet and clean getaway
Clean, roomy and quiet place. Great location close to everything..
Very clean, quiet, and well kept living space. Certainly enjoyed my stay.

My time at 'The GetWay B' was wonderfully peaceful. Geri's hospitality was amazing. She is a great host, fun person to talk to, and is involved in the local community. The space itself is calm and well-equipped. Full stove, oven, freezer/refrigerator, microwave and more. It's close to the town center and there are sidewalks all along the way, which was nice. It was nice to 'unplug' from the internet as there was no wifi (as stated) and I also had no cellular data service (Ting). I really loved staying here and hope to come back.
This may be fine for a couple of guys certainly not for a single female.
Great host, excellent location, pristine clean, attentive host, great porch swing, comfy and inviting-I'll be back!
My wife and I enjoyed our stay. The house was very nice and clean. Would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a place to stay in Paris, TN.
I had a wonderful stay at Geri’s place. She was an excellent communicator and the home is absolutely charming. Will definitely return when I’m in the area again.
Another great visit to Paris. Geri is terrific. Highly recommended. Tony
I had a great stay at Geri’s place. She’s terrific and really knows the area.
Geri's place in Paris was conveniently located and very clean. Quick response back to me when i needed some help - would definitely stay again when in Paris.

Beautiful older home with large parlor (living room), large country-style kitchen with full-sized stove and refrigerator, pantry, and lots of cooking and storage space. The bedroom is very comfy and inviting and has a full bath off the bedroom with a claw-footed tub and shower. There a full front porch with porch swing and plenty of off-street parking. There is also a back room with exit to a very large back yard with barbecue grill and picnic table. The neighborhood is quiet, peaceful and residential - lots of lovely older homes. This place was immaculately clean, and Geri went above and beyond to be accommodating for a "short notice" stay for a family situation, even to the point of waiting for me on the front porch when I came into town late. If you are in the mood to break away from the "seen one, seen them all" white, square, noisy, unsafe motel room, this place is a lovely bargain. One more thing, even though there is another apartment in this house, the good thing about older construction - plaster walls - you could not hear a thing next door. I hope I have done you justice, Geri. I will stop now, but I really did love your place.

If ever visiting in Paris Tennessee please contact Geri as her home is very well kept and met all expectations. She takes great pride in what she does with Airbnb. Thank you Geri A friend forever with lots of memories!!
Carol Drbohlav
Great place, ill be back
Geri’s place was perfect! I am a traveling therapist working night shift; her place was quiet and sparkling clean! I absolutely loved the nostalgic claw foot tub!

If you need more space than just a bed to sleep in, then that is where there is value for staying in this home. I was aware there was no WIFI so I came prepared with a book to read in our down time. TV was for use with DVD's only, so don't stay here with an expectation of watching trivial TV while you are there. Clean and close to most eating places, quiet neighborhood. Old house with old features, but quaint and most importantly, clean. Geri was delightful.

Geri’s place was clean and just the right size for our weekend in Paris! She found out we were on an extended honeymoon and left us the sweetest gift! Will stay with her again if we find ourselves back in Paris!
Great place clean and quite.

This was one of my favorite places. Everything was so clean and in order. If I needed anything, my calls and texts were responded to promptly. Thank you for being so kind and helping me when I needed anything for the apartment. I will be back one day soon.

Believe them when they say built in the 1930’s. The plumbing sucked. I tried to take a bath and water would go everywhere. There is no WiFi, two TVs that play only dvd’s, and trying to sleep was awful since there was noise coming from the house all night. (I assume from being so old).
This place is great! The hosts are very nice, the place is clean, the neighborhood is quiet, and there is a nice backyard for relaxing. This is my go-to spot for when I travel to Paris for work.
Great location and neighborhood. Easy walk to downtown, and close to all other needs!
Great place to stay, Geri is kind and helpful and very accessible.

So..... First I'll start by saying I've never visited Paris, TN ever. I traveled here to stay from Tues-Saturday from Dallas, TX as a getaway and to visit. When I pulled up Geri was there and she assisted me with my belongings. When I walked in the House/Apt. living room I could already tell it was perfect. I proceeded to the kitchen and there's just enough counter space, Refrigerator, etc. Basically everything you need for a long stay. You then walk into the bedroom and it's comfy and spacious. The bathroom is the perfect size and has enough storage space. I love the claw foot tub! The front porch is nice with a swing and the neighborhood is quiet. This is an older house but kept up very nicely. Geri is a wonderful human being and she was there when I needed her. I couldn't have asked for a better place to stay with an awesome host! Thank you Geri 😁

This Air BnB is extremely clean and well kept and exactly as described. Great communication from the host and made to feel welcome by her as well. Was ready to accommodate my needs and check in was a breeze. Absolutely no complaints noted by me. I loved my stay as I felt very comfortable there and would gladly return! Thanks for everything!

Communication was great.
Geri was very friendly.
Good location for restaurants or shopping.
20 minutes from Paris landing-Kentucky lake.
No cable TV but plenty of DVD's to choose from.
Worked great for our stay

Geri was available when we arrived, came right away and greeted us, showing us around and warming up the place! The home was clean and tidy. We enjoyed talking together and Geri was available by phone when we called. Cozy neighborhood in a wooded area. Neat claw footed tub! I would recommend.
Geri was great! Met me at the house to get me settled in. Since I was traveling by myself, the noises of a different house hindered my sleep the first night, but overall a good stay.
Geri was great and very accomodating

Geri was a very kind and gracious host. Our trip was planned at the last minute, but Geri worked with us to make sure everything went smoothly from the time We made the reservation until we left. She provided a DVD played and a good selection of dvds upon our arrival. She also gave us a quick tour of some nearby venues as well as ideas for places we might like to visit during our stay. The neighborhood was quiet and in a good location. The home was clean, charming, and welcoming. We would love the opportunity to stay at Geri's lovely home again.
I had a great stay. It's a nice little town and Geri was a great host.

The upstairs Apartment has low ceilings but it was perfect for me and my husband. There’s a nice living room, dining area and kitchen for cooking your own meals. In the bathroom there is a wonderful large old tub or outside the bathroom there is a shower if preferred. The bedroom was large and the bed comfortable.
It was a pleasure to talk to Geri. She is a wonderful host! I would definitely recommend staying here if in the area.
Geri was great!

My boyfriend and I stayed at Geri's place for the night, we felt it was a very pleasant and comfortable spot. Geri was very communicative before our arrival and her instructions to get access to the place were very clear. Great location near gas and grocery store that we needed to get to next morning, it was just what we were looking for. :)

Cheap, clean and comfy. The couple is very nice and helpful. The lady gave me a tour and told me everything I needed to know upon arrival. I had my own mini fridge and fast internet and they respected my privacy. One thing to know is make sure to let them know if you’re hot as they tend to leave the AC off otherwise.

I went down to go visit my boyfriend for the week and Geri's place happened to be right in the area. It was super affordable and the apartment was perfect for me to stay in. Super cozy and it was so nice having my own space. Geri was super welcoming and great with communicating as well! If I ever need a place to stay while I'm down there again, I would 100% stay here. I would highly recommend it to anyone!
very clean, looked just like the pictures, felt like home, very comfortable, aside from the low ceilings it was perfect. will book again ! price was good. got exactly what I paid for !

Geri was a wonderful host with a charming apartment. The walkway was well lighted and the place was very clean, quiet and easy to find. Geri was very friendly and while I was pretty busy during my stay, I enjoyed my chat with her and appreciated the check in to make sure I was enjoying my time there. Overall I would highly recommend this stay and the lovely host.
Please note that the driveway is gravel and if checking in late you will park in front of the house.

My stay at Geri's place was great! The space was clean, as described and had basic household items you'd need for a longer stay in the kitchen. She also has a Roku TV, DVDs and a puzzle for entertainment. The neighborhood is close to everything in town and I felt safe. The layout of the space is unique and it fully met my needs for my stay. Geri is an excellent Airbnb host. She is one of the friendliest people I've ever met and I enjoyed our conversations. Her communication was proactive and responsive and she provided clear instructions for my stay and local recommendations.
Quirky but great for a quick visit.
My wife and I thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Super good value for a cozy spot. Geri was tremendously helpful and hospitable.

Really enjoyed my stay here. Geri was very helpful and made sure I knew exactly how to get to the apartment. Was a lovely place with a very comfortable bed and everything I needed to live comfortably for my stay. Felt like a home away from home and would 100% stay here again

Kitchen has lots of room to prepare food. Roomy comfortable bedroom. Office with adequate desk space, quiet undistracting environment.

We arrived at the most beautiful and clean Airbnb that we have ever stayed in. Pops Cabin will exceed your expectations. It is more beautiful than the pictures. It saddens me to write my first ever negative review. Maybe at one time, this was a good place to stay, and maybe with a lot of attention and hard work, it could be again, but currently it's a rodent house. When I checked in, I did not see the glue traps the host had placed around, nor did I see the huge Servall Pest Control card that was under the night stand. I'm sure if I had, I would have asked questions.
After finally getting asleep around midnight on the very old squeaky mattress with scratchy sheets, I awoke around midnight to the sound of chewing and scratching in the kitchen, which had no door to divide it from the bedroom. This continued on for hours, keeping me awake, and making me very nervous. I waited until 7 am to text the host to ask if she had mice or rats, and to tell her I could hear chewing. She replied back "Mice, I'm sure. Just need to get some glue strips." I was surprised at her response as I had already without looking found one in the bathroom beside the tub, and two in the kitchen. I text her back, "I'm not rested and pretty creeped out". Her text back to me was unreal, "I've been up all night worried about all thus over time and keeping this business going. I'm creeped out too. We will tell Helen to get glue strips. You are bugger than it is. Lol. Rembrr you are the adult, the one with thumbs. Lol. You can drive and cook. What do they do. Eat and shit. Eat and shit. Lol. Is ok. Go in There and claim your place in the world. You can do it. Fight, fight, fight. What can he do? Eat ya? No, no, no. Lol." Stunned and certainly feeling ridiculed by someone who I expected to be appalled that I had such an experience, I text her back "Ok. Well thanks for your concern. I will be checking out today." To which she text back " Lol. You ok, Chick."
Even though I had paid for two nights, I stayed from 9pm to 7am the first night only. I immediately filed a complaint and a request for money back with Airbnb, sending screen shots of the text messages and the pics of the glue traps. I shudder now to think the hours of chewing was probably the mice trying to free itself. After the host's response, I just could not stay there.
The positives were a pretty quilt on the bed, and the clawfoot tub with shower added on, however the towels and washcloths were very worn and needed replacing.
I wish I didn't have to write such an review, but it has to be done so no one else has my experience. I wish the host well and hope she gets her rodent problem under control, just maybe she shouldn't rent her place until she does.
